title: Sannin no Muku na Hanayome
sinopse:
In the Sannin no Muku na Hanayome series:

1. Uragiri no Honeymoon (The Greek Tycoon's Disobedient Bride) [Asou Ayumu]
2. Kanbi na Aijin Keiyaku (The Ruthless Magnate's Virgin Mistress) [Momose Natsu]
3. Ai wo Tamesareta Koushaku (The Spanish Billionaire's Pregnant Wife) [Takakura Tomoko]
